title: About page: Only InfoCards should use black text

requirements.text: Update the About page styling so that ONLY the InfoCards in the "What Sets Me Apart" section render black text (both the InfoCard title and description), while all other About page text (including the main biography/body text and headings) keeps its existing colors.

quotes: ONLY the InfoCards on the About page should have black text .buildn it

acceptanceCriteria: On /about, the InfoCards in the "What Sets Me Apart" grid display black text for the title and description.
On /about, the biography/body text remains unchanged (continues to follow the existing About biography styling).
On /about, headings such as "About Me", "What Sets Me Apart", and "Core Values" remain unchanged (no forced black text).
No other pages/routes have their text colors changed as a side-effect of this update.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn components).
Do not introduce new routes or change the backend; this is a frontend-only styling adjustment.
nonGoals: Changing typography colors outside the About page InfoCards.
Changing the About page layout, content, or adding/removing sections.
Deploying/publishing to a new identifier/domain (not requested).
